title: Maargan
overview: "Maargan" is a heart-pounding murder mystery crime thriller that dives into the sinister underbelly of a chilling investigation. A seasoned high-ranking police officer grapples with a labyrinthine case, where every clue unearths a darker secret. The tension surges with the arrival of a cunning, enigmatic antagonist in their chilling debut, weaving a subtle yet electrifying web of suspense.
